nodes.text: The Grumani sector, also known as the Spumani sector, was a sector located in the Outer Rim Territories.

The Grumani sector was a part of the Galactic Republic. However, during the Republic Dark Age, vast swaths of the sector fell under the control of the Sith. During the Clone Wars the Confederacy of Independent Systems had a considerable presence in the Grumani sector, which was attacked by Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker following the Battle of Virujansi.
